EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Open House & DTF_Dubai_Q416.Reminder 10-31-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal Digital Transformation Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/dubai]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for tomorrow's Digital Transformation Forum in Dubai. See event details below:
Date: 1 November 2016 {{my.Save the Date}} Time: 8h30 - 15h00 Location: The St. Regis Dubai <[[http://www.stregisdubai.com/]]>, Al Habtoor City, Sheikh Zayed Road, PO Box 124405, Dubai, UAE Map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/The+St.+Regis+Dubai/@25.1832502,55.2520289,17z/data=!4m8!1m2!2m1!1sThe+St.+Regis+Dubai,+Al+Habtoor+City,+Sheikh+Zayed+Road,+Dubai,+UAE!3m4!1s0x3e5f69db64aec29b:0x3ce56b0d6a3a0da0!8m2!3d25.1833542!4d55.2542858]]>
We look forward to meeting you soon!
The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact Phil Reay at preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]>.
